class.name: AudioStreamBlipKit
class.brief_description: An audio stream used to configure a [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback].
class.description: See the description of [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback] on how to attach [BlipKitTrack]s.

method.name: call_synced
method.description: Calls the callback synced to the audio thread. This can be used to make modification on the same time.

members.member: Sets the master clock's frequency as number of ticks per second. This influences the speed of effects and instrument envelopes in [BlipKitTrack], and tick functions in [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback].
